DOC.brief_summary: The aim study evaluate possible correlation predictive precesarean section pain development postcaesarean section pain use PM . Patients Methods 46 healthy pregnant woman schedule elective cesarean section include informed consent . The standard operation procedure include spinal anesthesia , paracetamol 1 g 8 hourly , diclofenac 50 mg 8 hourly oxycontine 10 mg x 2 . Morphine use break-through pain . Before cesarian section threshold sensory pain measure 3 time , average use analysis . After cesarian section blind midwife ass pain rest mobilization every 12th hour 2 day score . Data analyze use AUC non-parametric test , P < 0,05 .
DOC.brief_title: Prediction Postoperative Pain Electrical Pain Stimulus
DOC.criteria: Healthy pregnant woman schedule elective cesarean section ASA III IV Chronic pain condition . Pacemaker .
